doc.title: Ricardo Baeza-Yates - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
doc.snippet: Ricardo Baeza-Yates (born March 21, 1961) is a Chilean computer scientist and director of the Yahoo! Research labs at Barcelona, Spain and Santiago, Chile. His Ph.D. from the University of Waterloo was entitled Efficient Text Searching, supervised by Gaston Gonnet and granted in 1989. ...
